hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative web solutions with modern technologies. I specialize in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a dedicated full-stack developer with a passion for creating efficient, scalable web applications. With experience in both frontend and backend technologies, I enjoy solving complex problems and delivering high-quality solutions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to work together!
